info.title: Phase Relationship Type
info.description: Relationships link the start or end of a preceding phase with the start or end of a succeeding phase. The relationship type specifies how the phase dates are linked with each other.

x-sap-shortText: Use this synchronous inbound service to read master recipe phase relationship types

values.text: [Third-Party Shop Floor Execution - Process Industry(3W3)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3W3 " Link To BP ")

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
